completeSolution: A complete solution for your operational management
mainDescription: TIMLEAD centralizes all essential features for operations management: Ticketing management, task planning, CRM, equipment inventory, etc. Our platform simplifies management and avoids tool multiplication.

features.subtitle: Why TIMLEAD is more powerful than a standard tool?

ticketing.title: Ticketing Management
ticketing.description: Efficiently manage your interventions, track requests and resolve issues for customer connection and maintenance.

geotracking.title: Real-time Geotracking
geotracking.description: Track your technicians in the field and optimize routes in real-time for better operational efficiency.

mapping.title: Interactive Mapping
mapping.description: Visualize customers, teams and resources on a dynamic map for optimal geospatial management of your operations.

planning.title: Smart Planning
planning.description: Optimize intervention rounds, maintenance and tracking of routes completed by your technicians.

inventory.title: Asset & Resource Management
inventory.description: Monitor equipment occupancy rates, inventory levels, and maintenance schedules while managing all resources efficiently through a centralized system.

mobile.title: Powerful Mobile App
mobile.description: Give your field teams access to all information via an intuitive mobile application.

chat.title: Real-time Chat
chat.description: Real-time chat with technicians, sharing photos, documents and videos from the field.

cta.discover: Discover TIMLEAD's power for your business
cta.description: Join companies that have already transformed their operational management with our all-in-one solution. Centralize your processes, optimize your interventions and improve your efficiency today.

projectManagement.title: Integrated project management
projectManagement.description: TIMLEAD includes tools to organize and track projects, manage milestones, validate tasks and control SLAs, for precise and efficient project management.

items.content: Ticket management and intervention tracking have become much simpler. Our customers are delighted with our teams' responsiveness.
The intuitive interface and interactive mapping make it easy to manage our field teams. A real time-saver and efficiency boost.

pricing.title: TIMLEAD Pricing
pricing.description: Discover our pricing adapted to your needs. A complete operational management solution to optimize your field operations.

difference.question: What differentiates TIMLEAD from other operational management solutions?
difference.answer: TIMLEAD stands out with its all-in-one approach combining ticketing management, geotracking, planning, and CRM in a single platform. Our solution is specially designed to optimize field team management, with an intuitive interface and powerful mobile application. Unlike traditional solutions, TIMLEAD offers a complete and centralized view of your operations.

efficiency.question: How can TIMLEAD improve our field teams' efficiency?
efficiency.answer: TIMLEAD enables real-time technician tracking via geotracking, optimizes routes, and facilitates instant communication. Technicians can access all necessary information via the mobile app, share photos and documents, and update their intervention status in real-time. This allows for better coordination and significant reduction in intervention times.

deployment.question: What is the average deployment time for TIMLEAD?
deployment.answer: TIMLEAD deployment is quick and can be completed in a few weeks depending on your organization's size. Our team supports you at every step: initial configuration, user training, and ongoing support. The platform is designed to be intuitive, allowing your teams to quickly get up to speed.

security.question: How does TIMLEAD handle data security?
security.answer: Data security is a priority for TIMLEAD. Our platform uses advanced encryption protocols, regular backups, and complies with the strictest security standards. All data is hosted on secure servers, and we ensure full compliance with current regulations, including GDPR.

support.question: What types of support and assistance do you offer?
support.answer: We offer several levels of support based on your needs: technical support via email and phone, complete documentation, personalized training, and for businesses, dedicated support with an account manager. Our team is available to help you optimize TIMLEAD usage and answer your questions.

pricing.monthlyDescription: Price per user per month, annual commitment
